title: Kogito Serverless Workflow at OpenShift Commons Briefing 2021
content: Following Monday (April 19th), we will have a presentation during the . In this talk, we will briefly introduce the CNCF Serverless Workflow Specification project and talk about the Kogito implementation and Knative Eventing integration.  We prepared a special demonstration just for this talk available at our repository later next week. In this demo, we will run through a use case to understand how to use Kogito Serverless Workflow to orchestrate CloudEvents on top of Knative Eventing.
